quote: A Victory without danger is a triumph without glory.
Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
Accept the challenges, so you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved.
Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
Character is victory organized.
Defeat has its lessons as well as victory.
Do not be afraid of defeat. You are never so near to victory as when defeated in a good cause.
Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
Even the smallest victory is never to be taken for granted. Each victory must be applauded...
A Victory without danger is a triumph without glory.
Concentration and mental toughness are the margins of victory.
Accept the challenges, so you may feel the exhilaration of victory.
All men can see these tactics whereby I conquer, but what none can see is the strategy out of which victory is evolved.
Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
Character is victory organized.
Defeat has its lessons as well as victory.
Do not be afraid of defeat. You are never so near to victory as when defeated in a good cause.
Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
Even the smallest victory is never to be taken for granted. Each victory must be applauded...
Every great achievement is the victory of a flaming heart.
Every moment of resistance to temptation is a victory.
Expect victory and you make victory.
Happiness is not pleasure, it is victory.
He invades authors like a monarch; and what would be theft in other poets is only victory in him.
He who gains a victory over other men is strong; but he who gains a victory over himself is all powerful.
I never expect to lose. Even when I'm the underdog, I still prepare a victory speech.
I never expect to lose. Even when I'm the underdog, I still prepare a victory speech.
I would rather be remembered by a song than by a victory.
If there be no enemy there's no fight. If no fight, no victory and if no victory there is no crown.
If there be no enemy there's no fight. If no fight, no victory and if no victory there is no crown.
If there exists no possibility of failure, then victory is meaningless.
If you think you can win, you can win. Faith is necessary to victory.
In war there is no substitute for victory.
It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle.
It is in the compelling zest of high adventure and of victory, and in creative action, that man finds his supreme joys.
It is not truth that matters, but victory.
It is the fight alone that pleases us, not the victory.
It must be peace without victory; only a peace between equals can last.
Men talk as if victory were something fortunate. Work is victory.
Moral of the Work. In war: resolution. In defeat: defiance. In victory: magnanimity. In peace: goodwill.
Muslims must believe that all power, success and victory comes from God alone.
No matter how hard the loss, defeat might serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out.
Once you hear the details of victory, it is hard to distinguish it from a defeat.
One may know how to gain a victory, and know not how to use it.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
Satisfaction lies in the effort, not in the attainment, full effort is full victory.
Some defeats are only installments to victory.
Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
Such is the love of praise, so great the anxiety for victory.
The advantage of time and place in all practical actions is half a victory; which being lost is irrecoverable.
The aim of argument, or of discussion, should not be victory, but progress.
The god of victory is said to be one-handed, but peace gives victory on both sides.
The misconception that a victory can be worth its price, has in the nuclear age become a total illusion.
The moment of victory is much too short to live for that and nothing else.
The most dangerous moment comes with victory.
The only victory over love is flight.
The problems of victory are more agreeable than those of defeat, but they are no less difficult.
The rewards for those who persevere far exceed the pain that must precede the victory.
The secret of all victory lies in the organization of the non-obvious.
The struggle alone pleases us, not the victory.
The virtue of achievement is victory over oneself. Those who know this can never know defeat.
The will to conquer is the first condition of victory.
There is a kind of victory in good work, no matter how humble.
There is no substitute for victory.
There is no victory at bargain basement prices.
There is some victory gained in every gallant struggle that is made.
To be prepared is half the victory.
To give victory to the right, not bloody bullets, but peaceful ballots only, are necessary.
Unions in wedlock are perverted by the victory of shameless passion that masters the female among men and beasts.
Victory and defeat are each of the same price.
Victory belong to the most persevering.
Victory belongs to the most persevering.
Victory goes to the player who makes the next-to-last mistake.
Victory has a hundred fathers, but defeat is an orphan.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
Victory is by nature insolent and haughty.
Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat.
War is a series of catastrophes which result in victory.
Wealth, religion, military victory have more rhetorical than efficacious worth.
What is the highest secret to victory and peace? To will what God wills, and strike a league with destiny.
When people contend for their liberty they seldom get anything for their victory, but new masters.
Wherever work is done, victory is attained.
Work is victory.
In War: Resolution. In Defeat: Defiance. In Victory: Magnanimity. In Peace: Goodwill.
